Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observer, it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observer4View
public class ClientController extends Object implements it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observer4View, it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observer
This controller is Client Side This class handles all type of messages: - it forwards to the server the ones sent by the client side - it receives the ones arriving from the server side and it forwards them to the client's view

    • okIpAddress

      public static boolean okIpAddress(String ip)
      Method which checks if the given IP Address is valid The IP Address is something like X.X.X.X, where every X is a number between 0 and 255
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip inserted by the client
      Returns:
      true if the IP address is valid, false if it's not

      Returns:

      Specified by:
